name: Tug of War (Dev_Usas)
description:
Game created for GMTK 2021 Game Jam. This was solo-devloper project

Tug of War is a game where you command your team to win against your opponents.

With each won match your team improves!

The match is divided between phases, in those phases trough limited amount of time you can decide stances for each of your teammates:

- normal

- hard pull

- keep balance

- rest

Each of them has their own advantages and disadvantages. Find out which strategy fits you best!

Fullscreen play recommended!

Credits:

Music: Sports FM by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
